attributes.name: width
attributes.desc: The width of the watermark, the default value of content is its own width

attributes.name: height
attributes.desc: The height of the watermark, the default value of content is its own height

attributes.name: rotate
attributes.desc: When the watermark is drawn, the rotation Angle, unit °

attributes.name: zIndex
attributes.desc: The z-index of the appended watermark element

attributes.name: image
attributes.desc: Image source, it is recommended to export 2x or 3x image, high priority

attributes.name: offset
attributes.desc: The offset of the watermark from the upper left corner of the container. The default is gap/2
